fields.name: Permissions
fields.description: The permissions for the local user. Possible values include: Read (r), Write (w), Delete (d), List (l), and Create (c).

fields.name: ResourceName
fields.description: The name of resource, normally the container name or the file share name, used by the local user.

fields.name: Service
fields.description: The service used by the local user, e.g. blob, file.
